Salt_Lake_City.Marriott Downtown at City Creek Hotel: Marriott Downtown at City Creek Hotel formerly Salt Lake City Marriott Downtown is a Marriott International run hotel located in the City Creek Center on 75 South West Temple Street, Salt Lake City Utah United States. The hotel was opened in 1981 and in 2008 underwent a name change and a multimillion-dollar renovation as a result of the city creek development. The hotel is one of only a few buildings that were built prior to the development of City Creek Center.
